item.title: TSM
item.description: score:-28 Chances: Nvidia is reportedly receiving a significant number of orders for its AI chips from top Chinese tech giants, indicating potential growth in demand for TSM’s semiconductor manufacturing services. Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSM) is making investments in the U.S., showing its commitment to expanding its operations and potentially gaining from the growth of the U.
